mapper.select: select * from attendance where attendancetim LIKE #{attendancetim}"%"

SELECT *,left(ATTENDANCETIM,8) FROM `attendance` where ( STR_TO_DATE(WORKINGHOURS,'%H:%i') > STR_TO_DATE('08:30','%H:%i') or STR_TO_DATE(OFFHOURS,'%H:%i') < STR_TO_DATE('17:30','%H:%i') ) and ( ATTENDANCETIM like concat('%',#{Mon}) or ATTENDANCETIM like concat('%',#{Tus}) or ATTENDANCETIM like concat('%',#{Wed}) or ATTENDANCETIM like concat('%',#{Thu}) or ATTENDANCETIM like concat('%',#{Fri}) or left(ATTENDANCETIM,8) in (SELECT right(WORKINGDATE,8) from workingday where type=4) )
select * from attendance where attendancetim LIKE #{nowMons}"%" or attendancetim LIKE #{lastMons}"%" having names = #{id} order by attendancetim desc
